TopicTitle: How to reclassify a vehicle on-orbit?

Articles.Content:
Let's say I'm not real good at the game, and I've launched a comm satellite, but somehow ended up with it classified as a vehicle instead of a relay.

How do I correct this? I figure it would be in one of the menus in the Tracking center, but I'm not seeing it.
Go to the craft in flight and r-click on the probe core. Reclassifying is one of the options on the menu that comes up.

Hi @BigFatGuy, welcome to the Forums!

1 hour ago, BigFatGuy said:

Let's say I'm not real good at the game, and I've launched a comm satellite, but somehow ended up with it classified as a vehicle instead of a relay.

That has nothing to do with being good or not. I regularly need to reclassify (and rename) the craft I send up.

@Vanamondeessentially said it already. Right click on the probe core (actually: any probe core or command-capsule / cockpit) and then there is an option to change it. What I wanted to mention is that the option is called "Rename Vessel".

If you have more questions, then just ask.
